title: Silicone Roll Up Drain Tray 17″ X 10 1/4″
description: An ingenious kitchen accessory frees up more counter space. Food-safe silicone coating which is BPA Free & FDA-Approve. Easy to clean, simply rinse it off right in the sink. Non-slip silicone design, the protective coating makes it very stable. Multi-functional accessory keeps your counters free of clutter by creating a multi-functional workspace directly over your kitchen sink. The space-saving design conveniently rolls up for easy storage in any kitchen cabinet. Made from heavy-duty stainless steel, this rolling mat can easily support heavy cookware without bending. Perfect for use as a trivet mat to protect countertops from hot items like pans or baking sheets straight out of the oven. Limited lifetime warranty for all mechanical parts, 5 years warranty for finishes.

Its versatile design and straight-angled nozzle coordinate with any kitchen faucet, whether modern or traditional. A premium matte black finish with a 7-layer coating delivers a lifetime of brilliance. For added convenience, refilling the large reservoir with soap, lotion, or detergent from above countertops is effortless with innovative technology features. Assembling this must-have kitchen accessory over your counter beside your kitchen faucet with an under-mount reservoir bottle is easy with just a few simple steps. title: 17 x 11 inch Golden Bamboo Replacement Cutting Board for Workstation Sinks
description: Upgrade your workstation sink with this premium bamboo cutting board, designed for both durability and functionality in your kitchen. Its dual-sided design allows you to use either side—flat for general cutting or with drain grooves for added convenience. Specifically designed to fit all workstation sinks, it slides effortlessly on the sink ledge, enhancing your kitchen experience with seamless versatility and easy cleanup. title: 13-1/2 x 17 inch Solid Wood Replacement Cutting Board Sink Cover for workstation sink
description: Elevate your kitchen's functionality with our 13-1/2" x 17" Solid Wood Replacement Cutting Board Sink Cover, designed to fit most workstation sinks. Details Crafted from solid sapele wood (African Mahogany), this cutting board is not only durable but also resistant to water damage and scratches, making it perfect for everyday use. The reversible design offers versatility, featuring a flat surface on one side and drain grooves on the other. It easily slides onto the built-in ledge of your workstation sink, providing a convenient and efficient way to prep food. Treated with food-grade vegetable tannin and mineral oil, this cutting board ensures safety and quality for meal preparation. Whether replacing an old cutting board or adding a new one, this sink cover enhances both the style and functionality of your kitchen. title: Whitehaus Soaphaus Hands-Free Multi-Function Soap Dispenser with Sensor Technology
description: Elevate the hygiene standards of your home or business with the Whitehaus Soaphaus Hands-Free Multi-Function Soap Dispenser. Designed for effortless operation, this touchless dispenser uses sensor technology to automatically dispense soap or lotion from a refillable reservoir. Constructed from durable stainless steel with a sleek brushed finish, it adds a modern touch while promoting sanitary conditions. The WHSD011 is ideal for locations where hygiene is a priority, and the dispenser’s functionality can be customized with replaceable internal pump cartridges (sold separately) that offer spray, foam, or liquid dispensing modes. Details This dispenser is equipped with a smart LED low battery indicator, ensuring you’re never caught off guard. With a soap pump life of up to 100,000 cycles and a battery life that dispenses up to 25,000 liquid cycles, it’s a reliable addition to your space. The 27.5 fl. oz refillable reservoir reduces waste and provides a long-lasting solution to daily sanitation needs.
